data.trans: Nhìn xa trông rộng, viễn thị
data.trans_hint: Họ cho thấy bản thân họ là những người cởi mở, chín chắn và nhìn xa trông rộng.
data.en_hint: They showed themselves to be broad-minded, mature, and long-sighted.
data.content_game_1: They showed themselves to be broad-minded, mature, and long-sighted.
data.answer_en_hint: They showed themselves to be broad-minded, mature, and long-sighted.

data.trans_hint: Lãi suất dài hạn đã tăng 3 phần trăm.
data.en_hint: Long-term interest rates have risen three percentage points.
data.content_game_1: long-term interest rates have risen three percentage points.
data.answer_en_hint: long-term interest rates have risen three percentage points.

data.trans_hint: Mẫu mới nhất của sản phẩm này có giá quá cao.
data.en_hint: The latest model of the product is overpriced.
data.content_game_1: The latest model of the product is overpriced.
data.answer_en_hint: The latest model of the product is overpriced.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy bị làm việc quá sức sau một tuần đi làm 10 tiếng 1 ngày.
data.en_hint: He is overworked after a whole week of working 10 hours a day.
data.content_game_1: He is overworked after a whole week of working 10 hours a day.
data.answer_en_hint: He is overworked after a whole week of working 10 hours a day.

data.trans_hint: Một vài vấn đề cấp bách ở công ty khiến anh ta không thể đi nghỉ được.
data.en_hint: Some pressing business matters prevented him from taking a holiday.
data.content_game_1: Some pressing business matters prevented him from taking a holiday.
data.answer_en_hint: Some pressing business matters prevented him from taking a holiday.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi bị cận thị và cần kính để nhìn rõ.
data.en_hint: My mother is short-sighted and needs glasses to see things clearly.
data.content_game_1: My mother is short-sighted and needs glasses to see things clearly.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother is short-sighted and needs glasses to see things clearly.

data.trans_hint: Lãi suất ngắn hạn thấp hơn lãi suất dài hạn.
data.en_hint: Short-term interests are lower than long-term ones.
data.content_game_1: short-term interests are lower than long-term ones.
data.answer_en_hint: short-term interests are lower than long-term ones.

data.trans_hint: Họ bán căn nhà với một mức giá gây sửng sốt.
data.en_hint: They sold the house at a staggering price.
data.content_game_1: They sold the house at a staggering price.
data.answer_en_hint: They sold the house at a staggering price.

data.trans_hint: So với các loại cây khác thì lúa mạch có thể chịu hạn hán tốt hơn.
data.en_hint: Compared to other plants, rye is more tolerant of drought.
data.content_game_1: Compared to other plants, rye is more tolerant of drought.
data.answer_en_hint: Compared to other plants, rye is more tolerant of drought.

data.trans_hint: Vấn đề này cần được giải quyết ngay.
data.en_hint: There is a urgent need to address this issue.
data.content_game_1: There is a urgent need to address this issue.
data.answer_en_hint: There is a urgent need to address this issue.
